/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided into multiple lanes by white lines, is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. 

On either side of the street, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to illuminate the scene as dusk falls. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
